thread.title: Angus Young To Join GN'R Onstage Tomorrow? [News]
thread.title_full: Angus Young To Join GN'R Onstage Tomorrow? [News]

title: Angus Young To Join GN'R Onstage Tomorrow? [News]
text:
Angus Young to Join GN'R Onstage Tomorrow? He sent them flowers and welcomed them in an orange vest, so much is certain. UG News editor since early 2013. King Crimson fan. I handle the news around here. Posted 22 hours ago 9 
Angus Young is rumored to be joining Guns N' Roses onstage during their upcoming Sydney shows tomorrow and on Saturday. 
First of all, Duff McKagan revealed Angus was there to welcome the lads right off the plane, tweeting: 
"Told we had to stay on plane last night in Sydney; 'airport security' wanted to do a check. We waited. It was Angus Young in an orange vest!" 
Additionally, Fernando Lebeis from GN'R's management team revealed Angus and his wife Ellen have sent the Guns some lovely flowers, adding: "I have missed these two, Angus and Ella. AC/DC Family." 
Angus already joined Axl and the boys live in concert at last year's Coachella performance, rocking "Riff Raff" and "Whole Lotta Rosie." 
Stay tuned for updates. Told we had to stay on plane last night in Sydney; 'airport security' wanted to do a check. We waited. It was Angus Young is an orange vest!
